name: Introduction to Defensive Security
description: Learn the fundamentals of defensive security, including strategies and practices to protect networks and systems.

name: Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) Certification
description: Information on the CISSP certification, which covers a wide range of security topics and is highly regarded in the field of defensive security.

name: Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) Solutions
description: Explore SIEM solutions, which are essential for monitoring and responding to security incidents in real time.

name: Incident Response and Threat Hunting
description: Learn about incident response and threat hunting techniques, crucial for identifying and mitigating security incidents.

name: Defensive Security Handbook
description: A practical guide to building effective security operations to protect against breaches.

name: MITRE ATT&CK Framework
description: A comprehensive framework for understanding and defending against adversary tactics and techniques.
